callback.mcsocket.on_op_join: You are using MCsocket, you can configure/use the mod by using the '/ms' command
callback.mcsocket.on_singleplayer: MCsocket is available in singleplayer, but you need to activate with the command '/ms'
callback.mcsocket.on_open_error: MCsocket WebSocket server failed to start
callback.mcsocket.on_close_error: MCsocket WebSocket server failed to stop
command.mcsocket.help:
MCsocket Help:
/ms - Main command
/ms help - Show this help message
/ms start - Start the WebSocket server
/ms stop - Stop the WebSocket server
/ms recording record - Start recording player actions
/ms recording save <name> - Save the active recording
/ms recording play <name> - Play a saved recording
/ms recording list - List saved recordings
/ms recording delete <name> - Remove a saved recording
/ms recording cancel - Stop recording without saving
command.mcsocket.start_error: An error occurred while starting the WebSocket server
command.mcsocket.stop_error: An error occurred while stopping the WebSocket server
command.mcsocket.error: An error occurred while executing the command
